column4: You can use the synaptic package manager to remove evolution. Though I can't say if it will remove *all* packages. But if you filter the list using "evolution" you probably should find most files. Just make sure that nothing is removed that you may need.
Though I think removing Evolution doesn't remove the Email-files in your home-folder, if you have used Evolution.
Well, then the Synaptic Package Manager (found in the System/Administration-menu) should do the job.
